title: Can we stop this Veigar whining?
body:
How many times have you had fun getting stunned and exploded by a faceroll that cannot miss you?

Yes there are much bigger problems on the plate, but we all know Riot isn't nerfing Lee or Zed anytime soon.  At least they're making things more fun elsewhere.

Edit: Wow you guys are spiteful, go ahead and downvote me for speaking reasonably because of the champion I'm speaking about.  And you hate Riot for favoritism :P

Chicken?
Casting Event Horizon on top of someone is harder than it looks, and requires a some practice to hit it constantly.
Just because it takes practice to land doesn't mean there should be absolutely no escape.
oh but he will miss you more often than not, the thing is you walk into it yourself >.
Since it's instant, he can certainly put it directly on you and there is nothing you can do save read his mind and flash early, and i wouldn't call that reliable.

stun has cast time and cast point, its not instant :D and if you know skill range and radius all you need to do is move inward or to the side and up a bit and it will miss, so now to cast a his stun it takes about 0.5-0.7 seconds and for stun radius to appear it takes another 0.7 frack that really, you might think its like syndras balls, insta spells but its not

And if you run that same way every time, all he has to do is not throw it once and you just ate a bunch of poke or whatever for running an odd direction solely so that he doesn't instantly kill you.

a .7 second delay for a move that guarantees the death of the person who gets hit by it doesn't seem very horrible at all.
